DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety TAS-303 female patient stress urinary incontinence .
DOC.brief_title: Exploratory Trial TAS-303 Female Patients With Stress Urinary Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: The main purpose study assess efficacy TAS-303 8 week female patient stress urinary incontinence ( SUI ) compare placebo measure percent change incontinence episode frequency ( IEF ) baseline .
DOC.criteria: Patient symptom Stress Urinary Incontinence ( SUI ) least 12 week prior study entry Patient least 1 incontinence episode per day , urinary diurnal frequency 10 less per day nocturia 2 less per day . Patient positive 1hour pad weight test Patient predominant primary urge incontinence accord investigator judgment Patient prior surgical SUI treatment Patient diagnose stageII Pelvic Organ Prolapse Patient symptom Urinary tract infection ( UTI ) Patient positive pregnancy test Patient physical examination , neurological and/or vaginal examination result , opinion investigator , exclude subject .
